title: Pain management guidelines
context: ยง453-1.5 Pain management guidelines. The Hawaii medical board may establish guidelines for physicians or osteopathic physicians with respect to patients&rsquo; pain management. The guidelines shall apply to all patients with severe acute pain or severe chronic pain, regardless of the patient&rsquo;s prior or current chemical dependency or addiction, and may include standards and procedures for chemically dependent individuals. [L 2004, c 189, ยง2; am L 2008, c 5, ยง2 and c 9, ยง3]
